ram_info: Define the RAM allocated to your game. Allocating more RAM can improve performance, but avoid allocating too much to prevent performance loss in other applications.
news_follow_here: You can follow all the server news here.
error_contacting_server: Error. Unable to contact the news server. Please check your configuration.
optional_mods_not_downloaded: ⚠️ Optional mods have not yet been downloaded. Please launch the game once to configure them, then restart the launcher. ⚠️
close_launcher: Close the launcher after the game starts.
close_all: Close the game if the launcher is closed.
open_launcher: Keep the launcher open after the game starts.
mods_info: The mods listed here are optional. You can choose to enable or disable them for your game. Recommended mods are marked for better experience.
ram_detailed_info:
Definition of the RAM allocated to your game. Allocating more RAM can improve your game's performance.
Note that allocating too much RAM can cause performance issues for your other applications.

- Maximum RAM: Indicates the total amount of RAM allocated to your game. It is recommended not to exceed 50% of the total RAM available on your PC to ensure proper functioning. If your computer has more than 8GB of RAM, we recommend allocating 3GB. If your computer has 4GB or less, do not allocate more than 2GB.

- Minimum RAM: Indicates the minimum amount of RAM allocated when starting your game. It is recommended not to allocate more than 3GB for this value. The typical value is 1GB.
mods_detailed_info:
Explanation: The mods listed in this window are considered "optional," meaning they are not required to connect to the server, and you can choose to launch your game with or without them. When the box is checked, it means the mod will be launched with the game. Otherwise, it means the mod is disabled and will not be launched with the rest of your game.

If a mod is marked as "recommended," it means the developers believe it is better for your gaming experience to have it. Scroll through the list to see all the optional mods available.
connection_error: An error occurred during the connection
